LoginDownloader
public class DefaultDownloader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Downloader

Base class for all downloaders

headRequest

protected Page headRequest(Request request,
                           java.net.Proxy proxy)
                    throws DownloadException
Makes HEAD request and returns Response headers. Throws DownloadException if there's any exception downloading this page. Usually it means that proxy is now dead.

Parameters:
request -
proxy -

Page object without content but with response code and headers
